Title: iTextSilverlight
Description: A port of the PDF-library iTextSharp for Microsoft Silverlight.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A port of the PDF-library iTextSharp for Microsoft Silverlight.

Notes

For information how to use iTextSharp, visit http://itextpdf.com/.

With Image.GetInstance(WritableBitmap bitmap), it is possible to make a screenshot of a control and add it to PDF.
The constructor of WriteableBitmap allows the creation of an WriteableBitmap out of a Control.

An example for this is provided in the source code.
Additionally i have provided an example on how to sign a PDF with help of iTextSilverlight.

Important: If you want to use custom fonts, it is important that you set the "Build Action" to "Embedded Resource".
